remarks: Cancellation law for mixed addition and subtraction.  ( ~ pnpcan2 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Dec-2014.)
statement:
grpsubadd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
grpsubadd.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
grpsubadd.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
grppnpcan2 $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( ( X .+ Z ) .- ( Y .+ Z ) ) = ( X .- Y ) ) $.
